alert.note: Alert for Door (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS GreenBay (East Central Wisconsin - Green Bay)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 24 at 5:19PM CDT by NWS GreenBay
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of central Door County through 600 PM CDT... At 516 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over the Bay of Green Bay, just west of Egg Harbor, or 12 miles east of Marinette, moving east at 20 mph. Additional storms were over central Door County. HAZARD...Torrential rainfall, winds in excess of 30 mph, and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Jacksonport, Ephraim, Egg Harbor, Whitefish Bay, Baileys Harbor, Sister Bay, Peninsula Center, Fish Creek, Peninsula State Park and Valmy. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
